alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:36PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Goshen and central Platte Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 336 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bordeaux, or 9 miles southeast of Wheatland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Chugcreek, Lakeview North, Bordeaux, Westview Circle, Y-O Ranch, Slater and Grayrocks Reservoir. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 60 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County
